title: Bruce Pavitt: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Founder of famed record label Sub Pop, Bruce Pavitt is a music historian, professional DJ, and cultural progenitor. His book, Experiencing Nirvana: Grunge in Europe, 1989, is a photo journal and a grunge rock micro-history, an inside look into a crucial eight-day period in the touring life of Nirvana and Kurt Cobain.
itunes:summary: Founder of famed record label Sub Pop, Bruce Pavitt is a music historian, professional DJ, and cultural progenitor.
